sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INSR2530 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RETRY_YR_MNTH , SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM , STD_EXTNN_SEIL_NUM , STD_EXTNN_BGNN_DT , STD_EXTNN_END_DT , STD_EXTNN_REAS_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #retryYrMnth# , #socInsrLssEmymtNum# , #stdExtnnSeilNum# , #stdExtnnBgnnDt# , #stdExtnnEndDt# , #stdExtnnReasCd# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #ismt# , #inptAddr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INSR2530 SET STD_EXTNN_BGNN_DT=#stdExtnnBgnnDt# , STD_EXTNN_END_DT=#stdExtnnEndDt# , STD_EXTNN_REAS_CD=#stdExtnnReasCd# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND RETRY_YR_MNTH=#retryYrMnth# AND SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM=#socInsrLssEmymtNum# AND STD_EXTNN_SEIL_NUM=#stdExtnnSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM INSR2530 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND RETRY_YR_MNTH=#retryYrMnth# AND SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM=#socInsrLssEmymtNum# AND STD_EXTNN_SEIL_NUM=#stdExtnnSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , RETRY_YR_MNTH , SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM , STD_EXTNN_SEIL_NUM , STD_EXTNN_BGNN_DT , STD_EXTNN_END_DT , STD_EXTNN_REAS_CD , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR2530 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND RETRY_YR_MNTH=#retryYrMnth# AND SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM=#socInsrLssEmymtNum# AND STD_EXTNN_SEIL_NUM=#stdExtnnSeilNum#

SELECT A.DPOB_CD , A.SYSTEMKEY , A.RETRY_YR_MNTH , A.SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM , A.STD_EXTNN_SEIL_NUM , A.STD_EXTNN_BGNN_DT , A.STD_EXTNN_END_DT , A.STD_EXTNN_REAS_CD , A.KYBDR , A.INPT_DT , A.INPT_ADDR , A.ISMT , A.REVN_DT , A.REVN_ADDR FROM INSR2530 A , INSR2500 B WHERE A.DPOB_CD = B.DPOB_CD AND A.SYSTEMKEY = B.SYSTEMKEY AND A.RETRY_YR_MNTH = B.RETRY_YR_MNTH AND A.SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM = B.SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM AND A.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND A.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
AND A.SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM = #socInsrLssEmymtNum# ORDER BY A.DPOB_CD DESC , A.SYSTEMKEY DESC , A.RETRY_YR_MNTH DESC , A.SOC_INSR_LSS_EMYMT_NUM DESC , A.STD_EXTNN_SEIL_NUM DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM INSR2530 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
